@@ -688,0 +688,9 @@
+        @Override
+        @ForceInline
+        /*package-private*/
+        Byte128Mask indexInRange0(long offset, long limit) {
+            return (Byte128Mask) VectorSupport.indexInRange(
+                Byte128Mask.class, byte.class, VLENGTH, offset, limit,
+                (o, l) -> (Byte128Mask) TRUE_MASK.indexInRange0Helper(o, l));
+        }
+
